main.name: Noorul Islam MBA CSM
main.description: with an experience of over 18 years in IT Projects Development and Management. Equipped with the knack of functional management along with the practical experience in project scoping, estimation, planning, risk management, finalization of technical/functional specifications. Expert in Ethereum Blockchain (GoLang, Smart Contract, dApps, NodeJS, Truffle, IPFS, ReactJS, Web3, MongoDB. Subject Matter Expert in the Capital Market - Initial Public Offering (IPO) Floatation, Local (Saudi) & International Equity Market, Exchange Traded Fund (ETF), Fixed Income and Sukuk & Bonds.
main.bio: Expert in Ethereum Blockchain (GoLang, Smart Contract, dApps, NodeJS, Truffle, IPFS, ReactJS, Web3, MongoDB etc.) development. Subject Matter Expert in the Capital Market - Initial Public Offering (IPO) Floatation, Local (Saudi) & International Equity Market, Exchange Traded Fund (ETF), Fixed Income and Sukuk & Bonds.

education.description: Hold MBA in Finance and secured First class, which covers the HR Management, Marketing Management, Finance Management and Management Accounting, Information System Management, Labour Welfare, Investment Analysis, Business Policy, Sales and Distribution Management

Hold Bachelors of Commerce (B.com) and secured Second class, which covers the Development Banking, Taxation, Financial Analysis, Entrepreneurial Development, Auditing, Corporate Finance, Personnel Management, Company Secretarial Practice, Cost Accounting, Corporate Accountancy, Business Laws, Business Communication, Accountancy, Business Statistics etc.

work.company: Computer and Systems Engineering, Riyadh, KSA
work.title: IPO Product Manager / System Analyst
work.description: HSBCTadawul Online Registration/Subscription Management.# Exchange Traded Fund (ETF).# Local Equity Trading System (LETS).# International Order Management and Settlement System (IOMSS).# Fixed Income Management System.# Financial Information Exchange Engine (FIX-IN).# Share Murabaha Management module in LETS.# IPO Management System (IPOMS); Web Client for IPOMS.# TARGIN Information Protocol Engine (TIP).# LETS Middleware Interface (LMI).# Reuters Order Routing Engine (ROR- FIX-OUT).# Direct Debit Management System (DDMS).# HSBC SMS Interface (HSI); HSBCTadawul (Online Share Trading application).# Collaborated with the team members, senior management and Client to maintain a continuous stream of information regarding the project status and progress.# Carried out detailed planning and scheduling to ensure seamless delivery of the project as per the delivery matrix.# Coordinated with the customers for business process analysis and understanding technical & functional specifications.# Instrumental in finalization of project requirements and resource planning and played a key role in strategic planning to assure achievement of agreed to functional and business objectives.# Led and guided the team and set out performance parameters/ deadlines; held review meetings and monitored the progress of the project as per schedule, and ensured timely completion and delivery of the project.# Coordinate with the users for business process analysis and creating technical & functional specifications.# Subject matter expert in IPO, Equity Market, ETF, Share Murabaha, Fixed Income, and Sukuk & bonds.# Introduced MS Visual Source Safe for better source code management and minimized the time and cost by 30%.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Noorul Islam must be one of the most brilliant Project Manager and blockchain developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he has 16 years of experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best team player in no time!
